${ModID}:GoldStakeRelic.NAME: Gold Stake
DESCRIPTIONS: Card rewards have a chance to be #y${ModID}:Eternal, #y${ModID}:Perishable, or #y${ModID}:Rental.

Card rewards have a chance to be #y${ModID}:Eternal, #y${ModID}:Perishable, or #y${ModID}:Rental. NL They also have a small chance to be #y${ModID}:Foil, #y${ModID}:Holo, #y${ModID}:Polychrome, or #y${ModID}:Negative.
